segments.text: Good morning . May I help you , sir ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I want to make a remittance to New Delhi .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you want an international money order or a banker's draft ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd like a banker's draft please . It's not really urgent .
segments.speaker: S2
